text:
e="preserve">Dino De Poli (24 August 1929 – 22 July 2020) was an Italian lawyer and politician. De Poli was born in Treviso, Italy. De Poli was elected to a single term as a member of the Chamber of Deputies in 1968, representing Christian Democracy.
He later was one of the founding leaders of the Cassamarca Foundation from 1992 to 2018.
De Poli died on 22 July 2020, aged 90.
